这是你情商不足。我没有什么仇恨。以前有！现在早就淡定，放下这个国家了。我用支这个字更多指代这个国家总...

You know nothing about the lowest class in China. Be honest, please.
You can easily judge them with their job, and you just think they can get rid of proverty by 'hard-working'? If they could, you wouldn't need to leave China anymore.
They are the ones you will always look down to. 'zhinaren' is the name that you give them. You really think they want to be evil? They just want to survive, though you and the most in this post will not pay any sympathy to them because you think they deserve all the pain and unfair in their lives, because they are so-called "zhinaren" .
